pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Saturday, November 21, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the opening remarks of the virtual G20 Leaders’ Summit.

The opening remarks will be streamed via the following link: https://www.g20riyadhsummit.org/stream/opening-remarks/.

8:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 session I on Overcoming the Pandemic and Restoring Growth and Jobs.

Closed to media.

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Small Business, Export Promotion and International Trade Mary Ng will virtually make an announcement with Prime Minister of the United Kingdom Boris Johnson, and Secretary of State for International Trade for the United Kingdom Liz Truss.

The announcement will be streamed via the following link: https://www.youtube.com/pmcanada.

10:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a G20 Leaders’ side event on Pandemic Preparedness and Response.

Closed to media.
